verbs.description: social media misinformation battle facebook and other social platforms [V: have] been fighting online misinformation and hate speech for two years with the u s midterm elections just a few days away there are signs that they 're making some headway although they 're still a very long way from winning the war google jack dorsey new york university ceo u s new york facebook university of michigan center for social media responsibility president donald trump mark zuckerberg twitter
